short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access privacy policy information on the fly while browsing the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DataTrust aims to bring greater transparency to website privacy policies by providing policy information dynamically while you browse the web. Determine if a site uses cookies, if they sell your information and how much of your data they collect in comparison to other websites who have registered their policies with DataTrust. 

If you'd like to learn more about a given website's privacy policy, simply click the "More Information" link at the bottom of the quick view, which will take you to the homepage for DataTrust.com.
